com.samsung.multiscreen

Class Channel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.multiscreen.Channel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Application

    public class Channel
extends Object
    Base communication channel for MultiScreen-enabled devices. Allows clients to connect, communicate, and publish (text and binary) messages over user-defined event channels.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Channel.OnClientConnectListener
      Interface to listen for client connect events, when clients join the specified channel.
      static interface  Channel.OnClientDisconnectListener
      Interface to listen for client disconnect events, when clients leave the specified channel.
      static interface  Channel.OnConnectListener
      Interface to listen for connect events.
      static interface  Channel.OnDisconnectListener
      Interface to listen for disconnect events.
      static interface  Channel.OnErrorListener
      Interface to listen for error events.
      static interface  Channel.OnMessageListener
      Interface to listen for user-defined event messages on the specified channel.
      static interface  Channel.OnReadyListener
      Deprecated.

      • addOnMessageListener

        public void addOnMessageListener(String event,
                        Channel.OnMessageListener onMessageListener)
        Add a listener for messages on the specified channel.
        Parameters:
        event - the event on this channel to subscribe to
        onMessageListener - the message listener to invoke when a message is received with the specified event on this channel

      • removeOnMessageListeners

        public void removeOnMessageListeners(String event)
        Remove all message listeners subscribed to the given event on this channel.
        Parameters:
        event - the event for which all message listeners will be removed

      • removeOnMessageListener

        public void removeOnMessageListener(String event,
                           Channel.OnMessageListener onMessageListener)
        Remove the specified message listener subscribed to the event on this channel.
        Parameters:
        event - the event on this channel to remove the message listener from
        onMessageListener - the message listener to remove

      • removeOnMessageListeners

        public void removeOnMessageListeners()
        Remove all message listeners on this channel.

      • removeAllListeners

        public void removeAllListeners()
        Remove all listeners from this channel.

      • setConnectionTimeout

        public void setConnectionTimeout(int timeout)
        Sets the interval for checking the channel connection. If the channel is not connected, then connection checking will start after connection with a service. If the channel is already connected, then connection checking will start immediately. Set the timeout to 0 to disable connection checking.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout in milliseconds

        Returns:

      • setOnConnectListener

        public void setOnConnectListener(Channel.OnConnectListener onConnectListener)
        Set the listener for connect events. Setting the parameter to null will remove the listener.
        Parameters:
        onConnectListener - the listener to invoke on connect events

      • setOnDisconnectListener

        public void setOnDisconnectListener(Channel.OnDisconnectListener onDisconnectListener)
        Set the listener for disconnect events. Setting the parameter to null will remove the listener.

      • setOnClientConnectListener

        public void setOnClientConnectListener(Channel.OnClientConnectListener onClientConnectListener)
        Set the listener for client connect (subscribe) events. Setting the parameter to null will remove the listener.
        Parameters:
        onClientConnectListener - the listener to invoke on client connect events

      • setOnClientDisconnectListener

        public void setOnClientDisconnectListener(Channel.OnClientDisconnectListener onClientDisconnectListener)
        Set the listener for client disconnect (unsubscribe) events. Setting the parameter to null will remove the listener.
        Parameters:
        onClientDisconnectListener - the listener to invoke on client disconnect events

      • setOnReadyListener

        @Deprecated
public void setOnReadyListener(Channel.OnReadyListener onReadyListener)
        Deprecated. 
        Set the listener for ready events (when the has subscribed to the channel and is "ready" to handle messages). Setting the parameter to null will remove the listener.
        Parameters:
        onReadyListener - the listener to invoke on ready events

      • setOnErrorListener

        public void setOnErrorListener(Channel.OnErrorListener onErrorListener)
        Set the listener for error events. Setting the parameter to null will remove the listener.
        Parameters:
        onErrorListener - the listener to invoke on errors
